name: Head-require
tagline: Extention for head.js to use resource loader like require.js
body:
# HeadRequire.js

Extension for head.js to use resource loader like require.js

## Feature

- Set main.js in script element's data-main attribute
- Multiple main.js available now
- Use `head.require()` to load resources
- Grunt task to compile them to a file


## Basic Usage

### Resource Loader

```html
<script src="scripts/head.js"></script>
<script src="scripts/head-require.js" data-main="scripts/main.js"></script>
```
"scripts/main.js" like this : 

```javascript
head.require(
	"the/path/to/foojs",
	"the/path/to/bar.js",
	"the/path/to/baz.js"
	"the/path/to/initialize.js"
);
```
» [Learn more about head-require.js](https://github.com/mach3/head-require/blob/master/doc/head-require.md)


### Grunt Task to Compile

Example :

```javascript
grunt.initConfig({
	headRequire : {
		dist : {
			options : {},
			files : { "the/path/to/dest.js" : "the/path/to/main.js" }
		}
	}
});
```

» [Learn more about Grunt task](https://github.com/mach3/head-require/blob/master/doc/grunt-task.md)
